availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Alice Baxter. Father of Mary Baxter, Bettie Baxter, J. G. Baxter, Jr., Belle Baxter, Carrie Baxter, Annie Baxter, Willis Baxter, and Emma Baxter. Clerk in Louisville in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 336B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson, Louisville, Ward 7, p. 98.
